document_data.name: The Genie's Bottle
document_data.mainbody: '''The Genie's Bottle''' was a [[festhall]] and tavern in the [[Amn]]ian city of [[Esmeltaran]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Bottle was built on the northwestern side of Esmeltaran, near the city walls.
document_data.Services: The place provided good service at reasonable prices.
